query:
SELECT 
  q.id,
  q.courseId,
  q.topicId,
  q.questionText,
  t.title as topic_title
FROM questions q
LEFT JOIN topics t ON q.topicId = t.id
WHERE q.courseId = 2
LIMIT 15;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3wc5j91T7XwfNX4.406ada0c06a9 --database RXc4pG5Wbo6eGZhnWSXpwa --execute 
SELECT 
  q.id,
  q.courseId,
  q.topicId,
  q.questionText,
  t.title as topic_title
FROM questions q
LEFT JOIN topics t ON q.topicId = t.id
WHERE q.courseId = 2
LIMIT 15;
